question: David Wright was ppointed as a Public Interest Director of __________.
explanation: BSE (Bombay Stock Exchange) has appointed David Wright as a Public Interest Director on its board. David Wright's appointment as Public Interest Director is effective from 16th March 2018. He worked with the European Commission for a long time. He also worked as Secretary General of the International Organisation of Securities Commissions (IOSCO) from 2012 to 2016.
